headline: Show HN: Multiplayer Browser VS Code
description:
Hi HN Community,

We made a VS Code in the browser that can connect to any computer and lets you code together.

- It can connect to any mac / linux device (your local computer or GCP / AWS / ...) - It supports extensions on Open VSX store. - You can edit together like google docs and also jump on voice calls and share your screen. - It uses webRTC for all communications. So none of your code goes through our servers.

You can try it at https://tym.so/signup?inviteCode=friend_of_tym

and here is a demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nG8xDXN2djg
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 多人浏览器VS代码
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 多人瀏覽器VS代碼
description_zh-Hans:
嗨，HN社区，

我们在浏览器中制作了一个VS代码，它可以连接到任何计算机，让你们一起编码。

- 它可以连接到任何mac/linux设备（你的本地计算机或GCP/AWS/...）- 它支持Open VSX商店的扩展。- 你可以像google docs那样一起编辑，也可以跳过语音通话和分享你的屏幕。- 它使用webRTC进行所有通信。So none of your code goes through our servers.

You can try it at https://tym.so/signup?inviteCode=friend_of_tym

and here is a demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nG8xDXN2djg
description_zh-Hant:
嗨，HN社區，

我們在瀏覽器中製作了一個VS代碼，它可以連接到任何計算機，讓你們一起編碼。

- 它可以連接到任何mac/linux設備（你的本地計算機或GCP/AWS/...）- 它支持Open VSX商店的擴展。- 你可以像google docs那樣一起編輯，也可以跳過語音通話和分享你的屏幕。- 它使用webRTC進行所有通信。So none of your code goes through our servers.

You can try it at https://tym.so/signup?inviteCode=friend_of_tym

and here is a demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nG8xDXN2djg
